content: FX 3-A Stud Fusion machine Compact and easily portable power supply base unit for fusion welding F-BT threaded studs to steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Hilti Stud Fusion is a revolutionary welding method which helps you avoid the high costs, specialist operators, inconsistency and rework associated with traditional welding Save time and labor – Stud Fusion is faster, safer and can be performed by non-specialist, trained operators. Eliminate the trial-and-error of traditional welding: simply select the type of threaded stud you’re working with, then this unit adjusts itself to the recommended settings for all working conditions Safer jobsites and yards – this cordless welding system works entirely without heavy gas cylinders, power cords, angle grinders, fumes or light radiation Get what you spec – the smart features of Hilti Stud Fusion make repeatable and more consistent fastenings to steel easier to achieve, even under tough jobsite conditions Simplify and standardize fastening design – engineering support is available via the PROFIS Modular Support Engineering software suite, or by phone, in person or on the jobsite with Hilti Design and Engineering Support Applications Mobile welding fusion unit, containing a gas can and rechargeable battery, to power the Hilti Stud Fusion hand tool Fastening to steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) for higher tensile loads or thinner base materials, and preserving the base material integrity Steel fastening in wind, oil and gas offshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings Steel fastening in oil and gas onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and other equipment fastenings Shipbuilding – block alignment, fastening false ceilings, raised floors, inspection grids and manholes, water spray separators; fastening of internal and external furniture and outfitting (lamps, switches, junction boxes etc.); support for electric/piping/ventilation services ### TECHNICAL DATA:Application: Fastening to steelBattery voltage compatibility: FX 3-ACertificates: CE Technical Data | Application | Fastening to steel | Battery voltage compatibility | FX 3-A | Certificates | CE | Charger type | C53 | Operating Temperature Range | 5° C - 40° C | Power (max.) | 5.3 kW | Power regulation | Yes | Power source type | Battery platform | Rated voltage | 52.8 V | Storage temperature range | -4 - 122 °F | Tool body weight | 28.2 lb | Weight | 28.2 lb ### ITEMS- 3859942 - CSF Tool KIT - FX 3-A, Charger, & HT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x FX 3-A_01 Cordl. stud fusion unit - 1x Sleeve - 1x C 53_01 120V US Type B Battery charger - 1x Sleeve - 1x S-BT 1/4 - 5Nm Torque tool - 1x FX 3-HT_01 ROW Cordl. stud fusion hand tool - 2x X-SH F3 M10/W10 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M8/W8 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M6/W6 Stud holder - 1x X-SH F3 M12/W12 Stud holder - 1x X-SHT F3 Stud holder change tool - 1x X-MC F3 Magnetic ground clamp assy - 1x X-GC F3 Ground cable assy - 1x Bending bar X-BB F3 - 1x Washer setting tool X-WST F3-BT - 1x FX 3 Tool case empty - 1x Sleeve - 2270478 - Cordl. stud fusion unit FX 3-A - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x FX 3-A_01 Cordl. stud fusion unit - 1x Sleeve
